description: In the salt marsh areas, the diversity of higher plants is followed through vegetation recordings. These are made from existing permanent squares and supplemented with loose vegetation recordings which are stratified random localised according to their current vegetation types or target vegetation types.
keywords: soortenrijkdom, oppervlakte-eenheid, vegetatietype, schorgebied, diversiteitindices, floristische kwaliteitsindex, vegetatieopname, soortenlijst, bedekkingspercentages, species richness, surface unit, vegetation type, salt marsh area, diversity indices, floristic quality assessment index, vegetation record, species list, coverage rates, Land cover
name: Vegetation coverage per species in % (Sea Scheldt, 1995-2007)
